column5: Hello all,  As I said in my first thread here on OFC, I'm going on a fishing trip up north at the end of this month and the guys I'm going with are going to be competing in a mini tourney.  Anyways, I made up quick little fish tracking chart for all of us to use and I thought maybe someone on this board might find it useful someday, so here it is.  Just print out a bunch of copies and you're good to go.  Cheers fishing_chart_day.pdf
not a bad chart....but I go fishing to get away from paperwork.....  :-)  Welcome to OFC!!  dk
Very good, have a great time, and I look forward to your report...oh and thanks for sharing the chart  Maureen
lol I saw that comment coming a mile away.  A couple of years ago I would've felt the same way.  I think I'm getting older and geekier with each passing day.
